turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I like to get a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say a venti caffe latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No milk, but can I get raw sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many sugars would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti caffe latte with 5 raw sugars to be picked up at the starbucks on woodhaven.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
